title: Kamigoroshi: Prologue

alternative_titles.ja: カミゴロシ〜プロローグ

synopsis:
A lupine sculptor crafts a tiny figurine of a girl, imbuing her with life and memories. He places her in his elaborate miniature model of a city, but what are the intentions of this godlike wolf-man? A revolution is brewing among his playthings, while a lone boy is driven towards a different path of revenge...

(Source: Fantasia Festival)
